title: Purchases
description: Displays who is participating in purchases over time.  Bar Graph will animate and change as the time passes.
author: Mathew Williams

title: Employees
description: Line graph that shows you the unique employee count over time.  There is a slideable filter that lets you zoom in or expand your focus on a specific date range.
author: Mathew Williams

title: Count of Interactions among Suspicious People
description: Displays which users are interacting the most among the suspicious group.  It also breaks it down by interaction type.  The bar graph will animate and change as the date filter changes over time.
author: Mathew Williams

title: Suspicious Interactions Over Time
description: A heatmap that helps indicate who is engaging in suspicious interactions over the course of the entire dataset.
author: Maria Lentini

title: Suspicious Activity - Daily Number of Interactions
description: A Calendar Heatmap showing the daily number of suspicious interactions. Contains an interactive legend that allows you to click on a color and it will filter out the lower bound number.
author: Brianna Montalvo

title: Interactions Network
description: Network graph showing how our group of suspicious people interact over time.  Includes different data sets across different date ranges
author: Paul Stanton
